text: Vanity Fair The Grammys is your music breather during 2017â€™s television and film awards sprint, and that goes for the fashion, too. Its red carpet tends to be less about Old Hollywood looks than, say, the Oscars, and more unpredictable, so be sure to check out the full spectrum of glam to gaudy. Read More
